extName.description: The official name of the extension. Kept concise for web store visibility and branding.

extDescription.message: Seamlessly capture and stitch scrolling, full-page screenshots in a single click. Instantly view, download, or copy your captures.
extDescription.description: The marketing description of the extension, focusing on benefits and ease of use.

actionTitle.description: Tooltip for the browser action button. Short, branded, and action-oriented.

optionsTitle.description: Title of the options page's browser tab.

optionsHeader.description: Main header on the options page. Clean and simple.

defaultActionHeader.description: Header for the default action setting. More intuitive and workflow-oriented.

defaultActionDescription.message: Choose what Weave does the moment a capture is finished.
defaultActionDescription.description: Description for the default action setting.

openViewerLabel.description: Label for the 'open in viewer' radio button. Clear and direct.

downloadLabel.description: Label for the 'download' radio button. Universally understood.

copyLabel.description: Label for the 'copy' radio button. Concise for UI consistency.

saveAsHeader.description: Header for the 'save as' toggle. Phrased from the user's perspective.

saveAsDescription.message: If enabled, you'll be prompted to choose a file name and location for each download.
saveAsDescription.description: Description for the 'save as' toggle. Uses active voice.

scrollingHeader.description: Header for the scrolling capture toggle setting.

scrollingDescription.message: Enable to capture the entire scrolling page. Disable to capture only the currently visible area.
scrollingDescription.description: Description for the scrolling capture toggle. More direct and imperative.

supportHeader.description: Header for the support/sponsorship section. More personal and community-focused.

supportDescription.message: Weave is a free, open-source project. If you find it useful, please consider supporting its continued development.
supportDescription.description: Description for the support section. Highlights the value proposition (FOSS).

viewerTitle.description: Title of the screenshot viewer page's browser tab.

viewerHeader.description: Main header on the viewer page, confirming success.

viewerDescription.message: Your full-page screenshot is ready. What's next?
viewerDescription.description: Description on the viewer page, engaging the user.

copyButton.description: Text for the copy button on the viewer page.

copiedButton.description: Text for the copy button after a successful copy, providing clear feedback.

downloadButton.description: Text for the download button on the viewer page.

downloadingButton.description: Text for the download button while the download is in progress.

errorButton.description: Text for a button when an error occurs. Less alarming than 'Error'.

screenshotAltText.message: A full-page screenshot captured by Weave.
screenshotAltText.description: Alt text for the screenshot image, improving accessibility and branding.

noScreenshotAltText.message: No screenshot data found. Please return to the previous tab and try capturing again.
noScreenshotAltText.description: Alt text for the image area when no screenshot is available, providing a clear instruction.

copyFailedError.message: Could not copy image to the clipboard. Reason: $details$
copyFailedError.description: Error message shown when copying to clipboard fails. Softer language.

screenshotGenericError.message: Something went wrong during the capture process. Error: $details$
screenshotGenericError.description: Generic error message shown when screenshotting fails. More human-readable.

captureCancelledError.message: Capture cancelled because you navigated away. For a full-page capture, please stay on the tab until Weave is finished.
captureCancelledError.description: Error message shown when the user switches tabs. Explains *why* and politely instructs.
